member.name: M:Fursvp.Helpers.FursvpRandom.CopyableButHardToGuessCode
member.summary: No lucky guesses random code. There are 414,208 possible combinations. An attacker knowing this algorithm would have a 1 in 82,841.6 chance (0.001207%) of getting 1 guess correct out of 5 guesses.
member.returns: A six digit numeric code that is easy to remember and copy by hand, but hard to guess randomly. Good for verification codes.

member.summary: Correlates the elements of two sequences based on matching keys.

The type of the keys returned by the key selector functions.
The type of the result elements.
member.param: The first sequence to join.
The sequence to join to the first sequence.
A function to extract the join key from each element of the first sequence.
A function to extract the join key from each element of the second sequence.
